26 bool HumanMgr::updateParams()
27 {
28  _humanSettings.clear();
29  bool ret(true);
30  if(updateHumanList()){
31  foreach (string h,_humans){
32  map<string,float> settings;
33  string policy;
34  HumanSettingsPtr set_struct;
35  bool ok= _nh->getParam("human_mgmt/"+h+"/policy",policy);
36  if (ok){
37  string move3d_name;
38  _nh->param<map<string,float> >("human_mgmt/"+h+"/data",settings,map<string,float>());//defaults to empty
39  _nh->param<string>("human_mgmt/"+h+"/move3d_name",move3d_name,h);//defaults to h
40  set_struct=boost::shared_ptr<HumanSettings>(new HumanSettings(settings,policy,move3d_name));
41  }else{
42  ret=false;
43  ROS_WARN("Invalid parameters for Human management of %s",h.c_str());
44  }
45  //find the corresponding human updater
46  if(ok){
47  UpdaterIterator it;
48  it=_updaters.find(set_struct->policy);
49  if(it!=_updaters.end()){
50  set_struct->updater=it->second;
51  ROS_DEBUG("human_setting for %s: policy=%s",h.c_str(),policy.c_str());
52  }else{
53  ok=false;
54  ROS_WARN("Couldn't find a updater plugin class called %s for human %s",set_struct->policy.c_str(),h.c_str());
55  }
56  }
57  if(ok){
58  _humanSettings[h]=set_struct;
59  }
60  }
61  }else{
62  ret=false;
63  }
64  return ret;
65 }
66 
67 bool HumanMgr::loadPlugins()
68 {
69  _updaters.clear();
70  _human_updater_loader = new pluginlib::ClassLoader<BaseHumanUpdater>("move3d_ros_lib","move3d::BaseHumanUpdater");
71  vector<string> list = _human_updater_loader->getDeclaredClasses();
72  foreach (string plug,list){
73  ROS_INFO("available plugin %s",plug.c_str());
74  //_updaters[plug]=_human_updater_loader->createInstance(plug);
75  }
76  foreach (string plug,list){
77  ROS_INFO("loading plugin %s",plug.c_str());
78  _updaters[plug]=_human_updater_loader->createInstance(plug);
79  }
80 }

82 bool HumanMgr::setHumanPos(const std::string &name,const Eigen::Affine3d &base, const std::map<std::string,Eigen::Affine3d> &joints)
83 {
84  HumanSettingsPtr settings;
85  bool ok(true);
86  //find the settings for that human
87  if(ok){
88  HumanSettingsIterator it;
89  it = _humanSettings.find(name);
90  if(it!=_humanSettings.end()){
91  settings=it->second;
92  }else{
93  ok=false;
94  ROS_WARN("No settings found to update/translate the position of human %s",name.c_str());
95  }
96  }
97  //find the robot in the scene
98  Robot *h;
99  if(ok){
100 
101  h=_scMgr->project()->getActiveScene()->getRobotByName(settings->move3d_name);
102  if(!h){
103  ok=false;
104  ROS_WARN("No human named %s in move3d scene.",settings->move3d_name.c_str());
105  }
106  }
107  if(ok){
108  if(!settings->updater){
109  ok=false;
110  }
111  }
112  if(ok){
113  ok=settings->updater->update(h,base,joints,*settings);
114  }
115  return ok;
116 }

118 bool HumanMgr::updateHumanList()
119 {
120  _humans.clear();
121  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue value;
122  if(_nh->getParam("human_mgmt",value) && value.getType()==XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeStruct){
123  for(XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::iterator it=value.begin();it!=value.end();++it){
124  _humans.push_back(it->first);
125  }
126  return true;
127  }else{
128  ROS_WARN("No human_mgmt parameter found");
129  }
130  return false;
131 }
132 std::vector<std::string> HumanMgr::humanList() const
133 {
134  return _humans;
135 }
136 
137 HumanSettingsPtr HumanMgr::getHumanSettings(const string &name)
138 {
139  HumanSettingsIterator it=_humanSettings.find(name);
140  if(it!=_humanSettings.end()){
141  return it->second;
142  }else{
143  return HumanSettingsPtr();
144  }
145 }
